NPC.name: serpent dragon
NPC.description: A coiled oriental dragon sprawled atop a pile of somewhat out of place throw pillows. His glistening scales the colour of a stormy sky while his belly is the cover of an overcast day. The sky serpent runs a foreclaw over his whiskers and yawns afore settling back into regal repose.
